H0.text: How many vertices (ie corners) are there on an octahedron. 4

H1.text: How many vertices (ie corners) are there on an octahedron. 8

H2.text: How many vertices (ie corners) are there on an octahedron. 10

H3.text: How many vertices (ie corners) are there on an octahedron. 6

A4.text: The regular octahedron has six vertices and twelve edges, the minimum for an octahedron

A5.text: Irregular octahedra may have as many as 12 vertices and 18 edges
